about_the_game:
Enter the magical caves and take a journey into the musical, mysterious depths of Noita.
Contains 63 tracks from the game's dynamic soundtrack. The almost three hours of music has been mixed and reimagined for standalone listening.
The soundtrack was recorded and composed at E-Studio in the mystical Sipoo forests, as a collaboration between the Finnish psychedelic/fusion rock group From Grotto and composer Niilo Takalainen.

Vol. 1 contains selected tracks from the first areas of Noita, along with some sweet out-takes!
Vol. 2 delves deeper into the Snowy Depths, Hiisi Base and more, without forgetting side biomes, secrets and additional out-takes!
Vol. 3 takes you through the Underground Jungle, the electronic grooves of The Vault, the doomy Temple of the Art and The Laboratory, in addition to some less explored areas and themes.

Contains high-quality MP3, FLAC & WAV files.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: Any will do
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any will do
  • Storage: 374 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 4500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: It's a bunch of MP3, FLAC and WAV files!
